mapper.select: SELECT tpq.NUM, tpq.CONTENT, tpq.UPDATE_DATE, tu.NICKNAME FROM TBL_PROJECT_QNA tpq INNER JOIN TBL_USER tu ON tpq.USER_NUM = tu.NUM WHERE tpq.PROJECT_NUM = #{projectNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT_QNA (NUM, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUM, PROJECT_NUM) VALUES(SEQ_PROJECT_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{userNum}, #{projectNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PROJECT SET CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NUM = #{num}
